name: Student Dashboard - Notion Template
description: Revolutionise the way you organise your academic lifeThis amazing tool is your one-stop-shop for all your academic needs. Say goodbye to the scattered mess of notes and schedules, and hello to the organised and efficient academic life youâ€™ve always dreamed of.What's Included:Academic Calendar: Keep track of important dates such as exams, assignments, and other deadlines.Class Notebook: Easily organise, review and study your class materials.Topic Overview: High-level summary of each topic you've
features: Academic Calendar: Keep track of important dates such as exams, assignments, and other deadlines.; Class Notebook: Easily organise, review and study your class materials.; Topic Overview: High-level summary of each topic you've covered.; Checklist: Break down larger tasks into smaller tasks to avoid feeling overwhelmed.; To-Dos: Prioritise your tasks and avoid forgetting important deadlines.; Pomodoro Timer: Increase productivity, avoid burnout, and maintain motivation throughout your study sessions.; Notion is an all-in-one workspace to store docs, databases, manage projects, company wikis and so much more.; If you don't have an account, don't worry. Sign up for one below, it's free!; Click"Duplicate"on the top right corner to duplicate it to your personal workspace.; If you're on mobile click on the3 dotsmenu at the top right to show the duplicate option.
